content.text: I'll create a poker-themed favicon for the web application. Let me first check the current HTML file and then create an appropriate favicon.
Now I'll create a poker-themed SVG favicon featuring poker suits and update the HTML to use it:

input.content:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 100 100">
  <!-- Background circle with poker green -->
  <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="48" fill="#0B5C3D" stroke="#D4AF37" stroke-width="3"/>

  <!-- Poker suits arranged in a square pattern -->
  <!-- Spade (top-left) -->
  <g transform="translate(25, 25)">
    <path d="M10,18 Q10,10 5,5 Q0,0 0,5 Q0,10 5,15 L5,18 L3,18 L3,20 L12,20 L12,18 L10,18 Z"
          fill="#FFFFFF" stroke="#D4AF37" stroke-width="0.5"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Heart (top-right) -->
  <g transform="translate(60, 25)">
    <path d="M7.5,17 L2,11 Q0,9 0,6.5 Q0,3 2.5,2 Q5,1 7.5,4 Q10,1 12.5,2 Q15,3 15,6.5 Q15,9 13,11 L7.5,17 Z"
          fill="#DC2626" stroke="#D4AF37" stroke-width="0.5"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Club (bottom-left) -->
  <g transform="translate(25, 60)">
    <path d="M7.5,2 Q4,2 2,4 Q0,6 0,9 Q0,11 1.5,12.5 Q2,13 4,13 Q3,14 3,15 L3,18 L3,18 L3,20 L12,20 L12,18 L12,15 Q12,14 11,13 Q13,13 13.5,12.5 Q15,11 15,9 Q15,6 13,4 Q11,2 7.5,2 Z"
          fill="#FFFFFF" stroke="#D4AF37" stroke-width="0.5"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Diamond (bottom-right) -->
  <g transform="translate(67.5, 70)">
    <path d="M7.5,2 L0,10 L7.5,18 L15,10 Z"
          fill="#DC2626" stroke="#D4AF37" stroke-width="0.5"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Center poker chip circle -->
  <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="12" fill="#FFFFFF" stroke="#D4AF37" stroke-width="2"/>
  <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="10" fill="none" stroke="#0B5C3D" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="6" fill="#D4AF37"/>
</svg>

content.text: Now let me update the HTML file to use the new poker icon:

input.old_string:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="/vite.svg" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <title>Grapes Poker League</title>
  </head>
input.new_string:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="/poker-icon.svg" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <title>Grapes Poker League</title>
  </head>

content.text:
Perfect! I've created a custom poker-themed favicon for the application. Here's what I created:

## Poker Icon Design:

### Visual Elements:
1. **Background**: Dark poker green circle (`#0B5C3D`) with a gold border
2. **Four Poker Suits**: Arranged in a square pattern
   - ♠ **Spade** (top-left) - White with gold stroke
   - ♥ **Heart** (top-right) - Red with gold stroke
   - ♣ **Club** (bottom-left) - White with gold stroke
   - ♦ **Diamond** (bottom-right) - Red with gold stroke
3. **Center Poker Chip**: Gold center with white ring and green accents

### Color Scheme:
- Matches the app's theme colors (poker green and gold)
- Uses the same colors as defined in the Tailwind config

### File Location:
- Created at: `/home/node/txai-projects/project/public/poker-icon.svg`
- Updated `index.html` to reference the new icon

The favicon will now display in the browser tab with a professional poker-themed icon that matches the Grapes Poker League branding. You may need to refresh your browser (or do a hard refresh with Ctrl+F5) to see the new favicon appear in the tab.

result:
Perfect! I've created a custom poker-themed favicon for the application. Here's what I created:

## Poker Icon Design:

### Visual Elements:
1. **Background**: Dark poker green circle (`#0B5C3D`) with a gold border
2. **Four Poker Suits**: Arranged in a square pattern
   - ♠ **Spade** (top-left) - White with gold stroke
   - ♥ **Heart** (top-right) - Red with gold stroke
   - ♣ **Club** (bottom-left) - White with gold stroke
   - ♦ **Diamond** (bottom-right) - Red with gold stroke
3. **Center Poker Chip**: Gold center with white ring and green accents

### Color Scheme:
- Matches the app's theme colors (poker green and gold)
- Uses the same colors as defined in the Tailwind config

### File Location:
- Created at: `/home/node/txai-projects/project/public/poker-icon.svg`
- Updated `index.html` to reference the new icon

The favicon will now display in the browser tab with a professional poker-themed icon that matches the Grapes Poker League branding. You may need to refresh your browser (or do a hard refresh with Ctrl+F5) to see the new favicon appear in the tab.
